MD.analysis.rotation

Package MD.analysis.rotation

def single_rotation
 Finds the spherical coordinates of a vector over timesteps for a single Major particle.

Detailed Description

This module is used to find rotations of particles in time.

Function Documentation

def MD.analysis.rotation.single_rotation (   M,
  Z,
  L,
  index = 0,
  sides = 6 
)

Finds the spherical coordinates of a vector over timesteps for a single Major particle.

finds the theta and phi coordinates where the center of the simulation box is the (0,0,0) axis.

Returns:
array theta coordinate at each time step
array phi coordinate at each time step
Parameters:
M Matrix of Major particles M[frames][atoms][x,y,z]
Z Matrix of sides of each central particle [frames][atoms][x,y,z]
sides number of sides for each Major particle
index index of particle to look at
